post_text: September 3, 2019 at 6:35â€¯PM#1Hi Guys, I have a problem with my macro clone:Clone Group "Source Group" at Group "Destination Group" If Sequence 1 thru /lm /ncBut when I Clone my source left group with destination left group, it doesn't clone correct.It clones all scrambled, not right clone the left source group with the left destination group, and so with the other groups, such as odd and evv, when I use the clone for these groups always clones the clone, would anyone know tell me what I can be doing wrong or is there any other way to do it? because I really need to clone my cues of performers correctly, because there are times that I use only odd and evv or left and right or in out, I need an urgent help !!! title: Error Clone Macro! H E L P!
